Small Northern Kingdom within Rivertania.  Mining town, extremely wealthy. Mountains are rich with precious gems and metals.

!2 People
 * QueenEmerelda - Green eyes, blond hair.  Beautiful widow of King Ront Ironwill.  (Malificent) 
 * PrincessRuby - Deep red hair, vivacious young woman (Ariel)
 
This independant city-state-like kingdom is very near to JelivasRoost, often paying homage to keep the city safe.  JelivA has become very fond of MountainSide, relieving pressure and sharing wealth.  In-kind, QueenEmerelda has taken kindly to JelivA and her ambitions.
